verses.name: Mark 14:8
verses.text: She hath done what she could: she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying.

verses.name: Mark 14:9
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world, this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her.

verses.name: Mark 14:10
verses.text: And Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, went unto the chief priests, to betray him unto them.

verses.name: Mark 14:11
verses.text: And when they heard it, they were glad, and promised to give him money. And he sought how he might conveniently betray him.
